mapper.select: select f.FAC_CD,f.fac_nm,f.fac_dt,f.fac_cy,f.fac_rct_MTN,f.fac_info,s.fac_run,NVL(FAC_RCT_MTN,f.fac_dt)+f.fac_cy MTN_PLANNED from (select f.fac_cd,f.fac_nm,f.fac_dt,f.fac_cy,i.FAC_RCT_MTN,f.fac_info from FAC f LEFT JOIN ( select FAC_CD, max(FAC_MTN_DT) FAC_RCT_MTN from FAC_INSP group by FAC_CD order by FAC_CD) i ON f.FAC_CD = i.FAC_CD) f LEFT JOIN FAC_STAT s ON f.fac_cd=s.fac_cd
